title: "Viral Wallpapers"
content:
Welcome to our website, where you can find a unique collection of abstract wallpapers inspired by computer viruses and malware. Our wallpapers feature a repeating pattern of shapes set against a black background, creating an intriguing and mesmerizing visual experience for your devices. 

Our collection is perfect for those who appreciate the beauty of abstract art and want to add a touch of edginess to their screens. Whether you're looking for a wallpaper for your phone, tablet, or desktop, we have a variety of sizes available to fit your device.

We update our collection regularly, so be sure to check back often for new additions. Thank you for visiting our site and we hope you enjoy our viral wallpapers!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of abstract shapes inspired by computer viruses and malware, set against a black background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
